svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Time spent on activities, per day (in minutes), Spain
Figure illustrates the time spent on activities in minutes per day. Each individual has been weighted by the proposed
weight given by the MTUS at the diary level, and normalised such that total minutes sum to 1440 (24 hours).
